name: Battle Clash (2024)
description:
Battle Clash is a medieval multiplayer PVP game. On spawn, each player is randomly assigned a medieval class and forced to battle against other players. Reach a kill streak to unlock your class's ultimate attack, and dominate the battlefield. When the timer ends, the player with the most kills wins!



There are 8 medieval classes in the game, and they each have their own unique set of skills:

Knight
Primary: Sword slash
Secondary: Defensive Shield Block
Ultimate: Blitz (faster movement, and attack speed)


Heavy
Primary: Battleaxe Bludgeon
Secondary: Quick Dash
Ultimate: Rage (increased damage, and movement speed)


Archer
Primary: Bow & Arrow Shot
Secondary: Bow Shove
Ultimate: Ruthless (sees through walls, and increased arrow damage)


Wizard
Primary: Spell Cast
Secondary: Staff Shove
Ultimate: Fireball (well, it's a fireball. A deadly fireball)


Spearman
Primary: Spear Thrust
Secondary: Defensive Spear Spin
Ultimate: Impale (throws spear at enemy, typically one-shotting anyone)


Assassin
Primary: Single Dagger Slice
Secondary: Double Dagger Slash
Ultimate: Cloak (invisible, but footsteps still visible)


Swordmaster
Primary: Katana Slash
Secondary: Katana Thrust
Ultimate: Barrage (super quick consecutive attacks)


Arbalist
Primary: Crossbow Bolt Shot
Secondary: Crossbow Shove
Ultimate: Surge (rapid fire crossbow. pretty much a medieval gun)


Play against your friends in a private lobby, or play against randoms in a public lobby. No one to play with? No problem. Play against bots/AI!

So what are you waiting for? Battle in the Clash right now!
